cause.description:
The orphans of Malawi have little food and barely and Education. You can help by either donating money which is the most helpful but also raising awareness can help too. The orphans need your help!!!! We also are trying to fund an ORPHANAGE AND WE NEED MUCHO DONATIONS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! PLEASE HELP!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
1. Orphans need money to go to school past eighth grade
2. They need money to help bring food to them
3. They need money to help bring water to them.
cause.mission: Raise money for the orphans of Malawi, Africa
cause.name: Help Malawian Orphans
